channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI’s Recruiting Bias Is Probably Slipping by Your HR Team. Here’s How to Fix That
item.description: A study shows that AI training data can reinforce hiring prejudices, and humans don’t catch it often enough.

item.title: Billionaire tech founder Joe Liemandt says getting an MBA isn’t worth it and you don’t learn a ‘fraction’ of what you would as an entrepreneur
item.description: When asked by podcaster Codie Sanchez if people should get an MBA, Joe Liemandt promptly said “no.”

item.title: Scott Galloway fears a market crash or social crisis in the next year. A top finance professor recommends putting money into baseball cards
item.description: NYU Stern Finance professor told Galloway the market isn't pricing in "a market and economic crisis that is potentially catastrophic."

item.title: Cloudflare Fixes Outage That Took Down ChatGPT, Reveals Cause

item.title: Here’s What Daymond John Thinks of Alexis Ohanian’s ‘Shark Tank’ Guest Spot
item.description: Ohanian is no longer just ‘the Reddit guy.’

item.title: Why I Still Check Social Comments—and Other Founders Should, Too
item.description: Entrepreneurs can use the unfiltered voice of their customers to grow their brands.

item.title: Gen Z college students have found a new cheat code to land them an AI-proof job: double majoring
item.description: Doubling majoring is exploding on college campuses—and it could be Gen Z’s secret weapon in a shaky job market.
